action.action-desc: Mr. Messmer (for himself, Mr. Pfluger, Mrs. Luna, Mr. Ogles, Mrs. Bice, Mr. Moore of Alabama, Ms. Tenney, Mr. Gosar, Mr. Clyde, and Mr. Rose) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and Workforce

form.official-title: To prohibit institutions of higher education from mandating COVID–19 vaccines for students or staff.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the No Vaccine Mandates in Higher Education Act.

section.header: Prohibition on COVID–19 vaccine mandates in higher education

subsection.text: No Federal funds may be made available to any institution of higher education that requires its students or staff to receive a COVID–19 vaccine as a condition of enrollment or employment, or receiving any benefit, service, or contract.
In this Act, the term institution of higher education has the meaning given the term in section 102 of the Higher Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 1002).
